scripts.new-story:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'),slug=process.argv[1];if(!slug){console.error('Usage: npm run new-story ');process.exit(1)}const dir='src/lib/stories/'+slug;fs.mkdirSync(dir+'/components',{recursive:true});fs.mkdirSync(dir+'/data',{recursive:true});fs.writeFileSync(dir+'/components/Index.svelte','

{data.title}

{data.subtitle}

');fs.writeFileSync(dir+'/data/copy.json',JSON.stringify({title:slug.split('-').map(w=>w[0].toUpperCase()+w.slice(1)).join(' '),subtitle:'Story subtitle',authors:[{name:'Author Name',url:''}],date:new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US',{month:'short',day:'numeric',year:'numeric'})},null,' '));const csv='src/lib/data/stories.csv',today=new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];fs.appendFileSync(csv,' '+slug+','+slug.split('-').map(w=>w[0].toUpperCase()+w.slice(1)).join(' ')+',Description,Author Name,'+today+',,Tags,1');console.log('Created story: '+slug)"
